sentences.en: According to census data , Asians make up approximately 3.6 % of the populace.
sentences.cn: 根据人口调查, 亚裔人大概占总人口的3.6%.

sentences.en: Against all these, alone among an indifferent populace, they pitted their youthful hearts.
sentences.cn: 他们带着年轻的心跟这一切奋斗, 在这一群好像漠不关心的市民中间.

sentences.en: Altogether injures cruelly harms innocent populace dozens of people, cripples 6 people.
sentences.cn: 共打伤残害无辜群众数十人, 其中致残6人.

sentences.en: An educated populace is a key to achieving change.
sentences.cn: 对民众的教育是实现这一目标的关键.

sentences.en: But the old man quietly faced the menacing populace.
sentences.cn: 只见老人面对着杀气腾腾的群众,神色从容.

sentences.en: But this act actually encounters the local populace's intense opposition.
sentences.cn: 而此举却遭到当地民众的强烈反对.

sentences.en: During the Warring States period, bronze mirrors prevailed among the populace.
sentences.cn: 战国时期, 铜镜在民间盛行.

sentences.en: Economy incomes, life conception and spirit most rural populace have great changes.
sentences.cn: 广大农民经济收入 、 生活理念、精神面貌也有很大改观.

sentences.en: If expands to the populace market will affect will be bigger.
sentences.cn: 如果扩展至大众市场,影响将更大.

sentences.en: Its populace was a hybrid assortment.
sentences.cn: 这里的居民是个大杂烩.

sentences.en: Many of the acolytes have been in hiding amongst the populace.
sentences.cn: 许多寺僧都隐藏在平民当中.

sentences.en: Many of the city's populace travel to work by subway or bus.
sentences.cn: 许多城市的平民都是坐地铁或公共汽车上下班.

sentences.en: the effects of the war on the local populace
sentences.cn: 战争对当地百姓的影响

sentences.en: The populace at large is / are opposed to sudden change.
sentences.cn: 人民群众普遍反对突然实行的变革.

sentences.en: Third, further realizes, maintains, develops the good most general populace's fundamental interests.
sentences.cn: 第三, 进一步实现好 、 维护好 、 发展好最广大人民的根本利益.

sentences.en: Without trust in the populace, can we win their hearts and minds?
sentences.cn: 缺乏对民众的信任, 我们能赢得人心 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: the people who live in a country
